name: MetricsPanel
functionalRequirements:
## Metrics Panel

### Purpose
Display key velocity metrics and statistics.

### Features
- Metric cards grid
- Average velocity
- Conversion rates
- Stage bottlenecks
- Trend indicators

dataRequirements.description: Displays aggregated metrics derived from Deals entity

entities.name: Deals
entities.description: Source data for velocity and conversion metrics
entities.usageContext: Metrics are pre-calculated from deal velocity data

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- metrics: Object with calculated metrics

### Layout
- Grid of metric cards
- Icons and labels
- Formatted values

properties.name: metrics
properties.type: {avgVelocity: number, conversionRate: number, bottleneckStage?: string, totalDeals: number, avgDealSize: number}
